body: Hi guys, well I'm a gold rank and i was looking through the perks of being gold and it said beta testing? I wasn't aware of this and how do I get access to the beta testing?
body_tagged: Hi guys, well I'm a gold rank and i was looking through the perks of being gold and it said beta testing? I wasn't aware of this and how do I get access to the beta testing?
title: Beta Testing?

replies.body: I Think This Only Applied Before Avicore
replies.body_tagged: I Think This Only Applied Before Avicore

replies.body:
When we originally released Avicade back in December (Before it was taken down) we allowed donors access to it before regular users did.

If we have more games in the future, there will most likely be some sort of testing done by donors.
